con:method.name: searchConfigurations
con:method.con:description:
1. The implementations must support criteria search by eCheck_SKU.sku_num column, pagination and sort by Process.description, eCheck_SKU.sku_num, eCheck_SKU.description 2. Iterate the result list of Configuration records, if a Configuration record has same processDescription, skuNum and skuDescription as its previous record, then set its processDescription, skuNum and skuDescription to null
Search list of eCheck configurations (only non-deleted data) by given criteria, page number, page size, sort column and sort order

con:parameter.con:name: criteria
con:parameter.con:description: the criteria to search (wildcard match). If null then no criteria filter applied

con:parameter.con:name: pageNumber
con:parameter.con:description: the page 0 based indexing. Must be >=0 if present. Assume 0 by default if null

con:parameter.con:name: pageSize
con:parameter.con:description: the maximum number of results to return. Must be >0 if present. Assume Integer.MAX by default if null

con:parameter.con:name: sortColumn
con:parameter.con:description: the sort by column, if implementations doesn't support sorting by the provided column, implementations must return 400 with proper error message and error code

con:parameter.con:name: sortOrder
con:parameter.con:description: the sort order. Must be ASC or DESC if present. Assume ASC by default if null
